name: American Firefighter Simulator
description:
911 calling!!! Citizens are trapped in building covered with fire and situation is alarming. It’s time to get into your truck and show bravery as a fire extinguisher. You’re on emergency rescue duty so you need to be ready to respond the fire emergency at any time! Start saving lives to become a rescue hero. Grab your gear and stay alert to respond fire emergency when the bell rings in fire station. Get behind the wheels of fire truck and drive towards the incident location to extinguish fire.

RUSH TO SAVE LIVES
Firefighter rescue people from dangerous situations such as vehicle accidents, structural collapses and burning fire. Turn on the ‘WEE-OO’ siren and drive fire truck to reach the fire emergency destination at the minimum possible time! Become rescue driver and work in fire station to save innocent citizens. Modern fire truck is equipped with state of art rescue gear, extinguisher and a very large ladder to reach shopping mall or multi-story building. The ladder on the truck is raised and lowered using a hydraulic piston rod operated from fire engine.

Become the best American firefighter and serve your city with this ultimate firefighting game!

Key Features:
10 Challenging fire truck driving and firefighter rescue missions
Modern firefighting rescue gear in realistic gameplay
Smooth controls for seamless fire truck driving in city environment
Realistic smoke and fire hose to spray water in emergency
Amazing fire truck sounds & ‘WEE-OO’ rescue sirens

Enjoy the amazing gameplay and give your feedback to help us improve this game in future releases.
